name: Easter M&M® Cookies
author: gtc8
summary: These cookies are so festive for Easter and taste delicious! Very simple.
ingredients: 2 cups Easter-colored candy-coated chocolate pieces (such as M&M's®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Beat butter and sugars together in a large bowl on medium speed until fluffy, about 5 minutes
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract
Add flour, salt, and baking soda and mix on low speed
Refrigerate dough for 1 hour for best results
Scoop tablespoons of dough onto an ungreased cookie sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are flattened and light brown, 8 to 14 minutes
Cool on the cookie sheet for a few minutes, then remove and place on a cooling rack
